description: Beacon response that includes details about the collections in this Beacon.

meta.description: Information about the response that could be relevant for the Beacon client in order to interpret the results.

responseSummary.description: Response summary, including Boolean and optionally results count.

info.description: Additional details that could be of interest. Provided to clearly enclose any attribute that is not part of the Beacon specification.

beaconHandovers.description: List of handovers that apply to the whole response, not to any resultset or result in particular.
